backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing products with admin-gated creation/seeding, public querying, search, and sorting plus authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA‑related requirements to source files and components with high‑level metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the artifacts directory is tracked by Git.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package the PWA as a Trusted Web Activity and publish it to Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining OKLCH‑based CSS variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, manifest links, icons, and script bootstrapping.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, shortcuts, and install configuration.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page displayed when the service worker serves offline mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing asset precaching, cache cleanup, message handling, and a network-first fetch strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Build script that generates a signed release AAB using Bubblewrap, prompting for TWA directory and keystore details.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Builds a debug APK from a Bubblewrap TWA project and copies the output to an artifacts folder.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Build script that creates a signed release APK using Bubblewrap after prompting for keystore information.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Initializes a new Bubblewrap TWA project from the live web manifest with prompts for output directory and package name.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack router, registers the service worker, runs a backend smoke check, and renders the app root.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Empty file intended to hold generated backend interface definitions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Modal dialog wrapping the admin product form for creating or editing products.
Form for creating or updating products with validation, image upload, and mutation handling.
Table listing products with edit, delete, and stock toggle actions plus empty-state UI.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Manages PWA installation prompting logic and UI, including install detection, prompting, and fallback instructions.
Shows a banner when a service worker update is available and lets users refresh or dismiss it.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the store’s footer with branding, links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Displays the main site header with navigation, authentication-aware admin link, and PWA install prompt for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Defines the overall store layout including header, footer, routed content, and PWA update banner.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Exports the app slug and metadata used for deployment and display.
frontend/src/config/index.ts: Loads environment config and creates the backend canister actor with its IDL interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Defines product queries and mutations backed by the actor, including load, create, update, delete, stock toggle, and seed operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface requiring authentication to view, create, edit, and manage products.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, features, and featured products loaded from backend.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page offering navigation back to home or product listings.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays a single product’s details, handling loading, errors, missing products, and fallback images.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with search, sorting, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, listens for updates, and dispatches events for UI update prompts.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts an uploaded image File into a base64 Data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeSmokeCheck.ts: Performs a non-blocking backend connectivity test by fetching products and logging results.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and enables typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, PWA-related feature requirements, and current project state.
